name: putIndexAtIndex

type.rawType: <T>(array: T[], index: number, toIndex: number) => any[]

value:
<T>(
  array: T[],
  index: number,
  toIndex: number
) => {
  const item = array[index];
  const arrayWithoutIndex = removeIndexFromArray(array, index);
  const changedArray = insertAt(arrayWithoutIndex, item, toIndex);
  return changedArray;
}
description: Takes an item from an index of an array and put it somewhere at another index
